comments.body: It's easy but if you like the step by step process, this is one of the many tutorials that you can follow. --> https://bitcoin.org/en/getting-startedTo add more privacy to your transactions, what you need to do is to use mixers and that's for sure gonna make you more anonymous than without using it.
